statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -2 \\ 4 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 18 \\ 0 \\ -18 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -30 \\ 4 \\ 28 \\ 10 \end{array}\right] span or don't span \mathbb{R}^4.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 2 \\ 2 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -2 \\ 4 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 18 \\ 0 \\ -18 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} -30 \\ 4 \\ 28 \\ 10 \end{array}\right] do not span \mathbb{R}^4.
